posts.post_content:
I have a spare Caruthers Goodwin now and was hoping that another 19th century collector would like to trade.  Let me know if there is any interest.  I'm not looking for anything in particular or any condition in particular.  Just a swap of 19th century baseball cards.

Thanks,

Jeremy
Anybody?  Just looking to swap 19th century baseball cards, doesn't have to be anyone or anything special, I just have 2 Caruthers cards and only need 1.
